nodes.text: Star Wars - Die Letzten Jedi is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. It contains dramatized passages from the film script performed by a cast in German translation along with narration by Joachim Kerzel. The CD was released by Universal Music in 2018 as part of a series of five single-disc audio adaptations of the sequel trilogy & the two Star Wars Story films.
